montaj.title: Professional Furniture Assembly
montaj.meta_title: Furniture Assembly Service Istanbul | IKEA, Wayfair Installation
montaj.meta_desc: Expert assembly for wardrobes, beds, bookshelves. IKEA, Koçtaş and all brands. Fast and clean workmanship.
montaj.description:
Does assembling new furniture intimidate you? Or do you need your furniture reassembled after moving?

At Mr. Fix, we are experts in products from all brands like IKEA, Wayfair, Vivense, and more. Incorrect assembly shortens the life of your furniture and risks your safety. With our expert team, we assemble your furniture according to the manual, leveled, and sturdy.

We don't just assemble; wall anchoring, door alignment, and child safety measures are applied as standard.

tamirat.title: Home Repair & Plumbing
tamirat.meta_desc: Faucet repair, flush tank replacement, curtain rod installation, and general home repairs. Urgeny handyman in Maslak.
tamirat.description:
Small faults in the home can grow over time and become annoying. Dripping faucets, malfunctioning flush tanks, or broken door handles...

We are by your side for every 'Handyman needed' job in your home. We offer a wide range of services from curtain rod installation to faucet replacement, door lock repair to window adjustments. We detect and repair instantly without breaking or damaging anything.

elektrik.title: Electrical & Lighting Services
elektrik.meta_desc: Fuse failure, chandelier installation, socket replacement, and LED lighting works. Certified electrician.
elektrik.description:
Electrical work is no joke. The slightest spark or smell of burning in your home can be a sign of serious risks.

With our certified electricians, we offer safe services ranging from chandelier installation to changing socket locations, fuse panel malfunctions to LED strip applications. We add value to your home with aesthetic cabling and correct lighting solutions.

boya.title: Painting & Wallpaper
boya.meta_title: Painter Istanbul | Clean and Fast House Painting
boya.meta_desc: Renew your home! Premium paint options. Clean painting service with full masking.
boya.description:
The most effective way to change the atmosphere of your home is a professional paint job. But painting isn't just about brushing.

We start by protecting your belongings (masking) and repairing cracks/holes in the walls (plaster repair). Using high-quality paints, we achieve a smooth surface without leaving marks. When the job is done, we clean your house and hand it over.

temizlik.title: Professional Cleaning Services
temizlik.meta_desc: Detailed home cleaning, office cleaning, and post-construction cleaning. Reliable staff, professional equipment.
temizlik.description:
We offer more than classic daily cleaning. We use professional equipment for tough post-renovation cleaning, pre-move deep cleaning, or regular office cleaning.

We transform your home into a hygienic living space with steam cleaning machines, industrial vacuums, and surface-specific detergents.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.content:
Agreement

The use of this website and all other websites under Mr. Fix domain is subject to the terms and conditions explained here. When the user visits this website, they agree to be bound by these terms and conditions, which constitute a binding agreement between the user and Mr. Fix.

User Information

Mr. Fix never collects any type of personally identifiable information about the user such as name, address, phone number unless they choose to provide it via contact forms or service requests. E-mails, name, surname and address information are only asked if the user requests a service or contacts us, and this information is only used for customer services purposes and Mr. Fix doesn’t share any user information with any other entity. However, when the user visits Mr. Fix’s websites, our computers may automatically collect statistics about the user’s visit. Mr. Fix may monitor statistics such as how many users visit the website, the users’ IP addresses, and which browsers are used. Mr. Fix only uses aggregated statistics of this visitor information to help improve the performance of the website.

Information Use

Mr. Fix uses the information collected primarily to process the task for which the user visited the website (e.g., repair or assembly services). Mr. Fix takes all reasonable precautions to prevent unauthorized access to this information.

Data Collection & Cookies

A 'cookie' is a piece of information that the website sends to the user’s browser. A user can use Mr. Fix’s website without cookies. Mr. Fix uses cookies to enhance the user experience. Mr. Fix cannot use these cookies to personally identify the user in any way.

Disclosure by Law

If Mr. Fix is required by law to disclose certain information to local, national or international law enforcement authorities, it will do so.

Contacting Mr. Fix

If you have any questions about Mr. Fix’s Privacy Policy, please email info@mrfixistanbul.com.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services.
FAQ.a1: We provide service in most regions of Istanbul, especially in Maslak 1453, Sariyer, Besiktas, Eyüp and Kagithane.
FAQ.a2: An approximate price is shared in the preliminary meeting according to the nature of the work. The exact pricing is finalized after the on-site inspection. Please note that a minimum service fee applies if the process cannot be performed for technical reasons after arrival.
FAQ.q3: Do you provide a warranty for the work?
FAQ.a3: Yes, all assembly and repair workmanship we do is under Mr. Fix warranty. We are by your side for technical problems after the process.
FAQ.q4: Can I call a handyman on the same day?
FAQ.a4: We provide same-day service depending on availability. For Maslak 1453 area, our response time is between 30-60 minutes.
FAQ.q5: Does the handyman provide the materials?
FAQ.a5: In cases requiring parts or materials, you can buy them yourself or the technician can provide quality parts with your approval.
FAQ.q6: Is there language support for foreign customers?
FAQ.a6: Yes, our team can communicate fluently in English. We offer professional communication support for our international customers.

FAQ.cta_desc: Contact our expert team immediately, we will answer all your questions.
